channel.title: Inability to edit EasyRSC (NoobScape v2) client
channel.description:
I open mudclient.java, and make a few changes to the buttons on the login screen. I make a few changes, save, and close. When I open the file again, my changes have disappeared. Every time I close mudclient.java, it just reverts back to its original state. Am I doing something wrong?
Dragonsox

item.title: Inability to edit EasyRSC (NoobScape v2) client
item.dc:creator: @xx_c1ph3r_xx xx c1ph3r xx
item.description:
@xx_c1ph3r_xx wrote:

What operating system are you on, just curious, could have something to do with file permissions.

Read full topic
item.source: Inability to edit EasyRSC (NoobScape v2) client
